rows.name: setOpen
rows.notes: Called on dismiss/close; update your signal/state here.

rows.name: builder
rows.notes: Builds the dialog content; call close(reason?) to dismiss.

rows.name: modal
rows.notes: When true: traps focus, disables outside pointer events, scroll-locks, and aria-hides outside content.

rows.name: backdrop
rows.notes: Renders a backdrop element behind the dialog panel.

rows.name: initialFocus
rows.notes: Element to focus on open (modal focus-scope only).

rows.name: restoreFocus
rows.notes: Restore focus to the previously focused element on close.

rows.name: onOpenAutoFocus
rows.notes: Preventable hook to customize autofocus on mount.

rows.name: onCloseAutoFocus
rows.notes: Preventable hook to customize autofocus on unmount.

rows.name: labelledBy
rows.notes: Sets aria-labelledby on the dialog content.

rows.name: describedBy
rows.notes: Sets aria-describedby on the dialog content.

rows.name: portalId
rows.notes: Optional id for the Portal container.
